$! You must choose a business structure when you start a new business. $! 

The structure you choose will define your legal responsibilities, like:

- the paperwork you must fill in to get started
- the taxes you'll have to manage and pay
- how you can personally take the profit your business makes
- your personal responsibilities if your business makes a loss

Most businesses in the UK are:

- [sole traders](/set-up-sole-trader "Set up as a sole trader")
- [limited companies](/limited-company-formation "Setting up a limited company")
- [partnerships](/set-up-business-partnership "Set up a business partnership")
overview: The types of legal business structure you can choose when you're starting a new business
title: Choose a legal structure for a new business
